title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 578.21 - Medical facilities previously depreciated under the medicare and/or medicaid program
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 578.21 - Medical facilities previously depreciated under the medicare and/or medicaid program

State Regulations

Allowable depreciation for assets previously depreciated
under Medicare and/or Medicaid will be limited to the lower of the acquisition
cost of the asset to the new owners or the historical cost to the owner of
record as of July 18, 1984, or in the case of an asset not in existence as of
that date, the first owner of record of the asset after that
date. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 14
ยง
578.21

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
